data.text:
Blind Horse Books is on vacation from July 21, 2024 to July 29, 2024. We are traveling and will be at the Tennessee Antiquarian Book and Paper Show in Nashville July 26-25. All orders placed will not be shipped until Tuesday July 30.

Sivertson, Howard

Tales of the Old North Shore: Paintings and Companion Stories [Lake Superior: Art and History]

Duluth, MN: Lake Superior Port Cities, 1996. Second Printing.

No Flaws or Blemishes; Gift Quality. Oblong; 11.25 by 9.5 inches. Signed by the artist/Author on the title page.

New / No Dust Jacket As Issued. Item #17354

ISBN: 0942235290

An award-winning collection of paintings and stories, 44 in all, will lead you along on the sometimes daring, often humorous and always poignant adventures of the folks who called the North Shore and Isle Royale home.

Sivertson's imagination and detail draw us to the mystical shores of Lake Superior. From the rollicking voyageurs to the heyday of commercial fisherman.

Price: $45.00

See all items in CHILDREN'S BOOKS

See all items by Howard Sivertson
